name: Typeracer-Clone
description: A clone of the most famous typing game - Typeracer. This is a multiplayer game which uses sockets. It was made with NodeJS and Angular.

name: Elite-Classroom-Backend
description: Back-end for the app Elite Classroom. A workspace for education designed for students and teachers to manage classes, assignments and discussions.

name: Portfolio Website
description: My portfolio website, made with ReactJs and NextJs.

name: JEE-Management-System
description: A simple GUI Student Management System made in Java where students and teachers can login to see their test scores and results.

name: pcon-nodejs-todo
description: A simple notes taking app made with nodeJs, mysql and react. This app does not contain any user authentication. This was made to learn the basics of making a server and its interaction with a SQL database.

name: Path-Tracer
description: This project was intended to get familiar with OOPS in C++ and learn some path tracing on the way. This project was made by following the steps mentioned in the book Ray Tracing in One Weekend.

name: social-media-app-server
description: A graphql server for a generic social media app.

name: roleBasedApiAuthentication
description: A simple NodeJs server that authenticates user based on their roles.
